guide: You can get easy contribution for
this by breaking some Wheat in the Hub.
If you want faster contribution,
make a Sugar Cane farm in your Garden.
Recommended for this is to fish in the
Backwater Bayou with the best rod you have
access to and full Angler Set or better.
To get easy progress in this do
contests like Wheat, Potato
or Carrot as those are easy
Bronze or Silver Medals to get.
You can also try to utilize pests to help here.
Do your daily mining commissions.
A higher level Bingo Pet will benefit you here.
For this pretty much all ores count, just
things like Cobblestone/Stone don't. To get faster
progress here you'll want to use as much Mining Speed
and Spread as possible and pair it with the Pickobulus
pickaxe ability that unlocks at HotM 3.
Look for mobs with a purple name
and kill it.
Buy a Raider Axe for 130k coins
from the Melancholic Viking in The Park.
Remember: Level 1 Enchantments do count.
You will most likely get this from leveling up
skills and selling crops from Farming.
Remember to actually put the money
you get in the Bank :)
Buy a Dirt Bottle (100k) from the Smithmonger in the Hub
and reforge an uncommon or higher rarity weapon with it.
Also don't forget to grab your Cake Buff for extra Ferocity
(visit xMeru, nightlibra or Yadi)
§fNo eggs:
Dolphin, Bee, Grandma Wolf, Bingo, Rock, Owl,
Enderman, Tarantula, Hermit Crab and Oringo pets
§fEggs needed:
Jerry, Rabbit, Pig, Chicken, Bat, Silverfish
To get the Enchanted Eggs needed, kill Chickens
in The Barn till you get the Chicken Head recipe.
Once you get your first Enchanted Egg, put it into
one Chicken Minion to generate more of those over time.
Mine Nodes in The End and kill Obsidian Defenders
down in the Dragons Nest to craft some Obsidian Minions.
Place them on your island and give them the best fuel
and storage that you have access to and collect in time.
You can unlock §e17/17 §7Farming Collections,
§e6/11 §7Combat Collections, §e6/6 §7Foraging Collections,
§e14/22 §7Mining Collections for a total of §e43 §7collections.
You will also get some Fishing Collections.
For this you can either use ~95 Enchanted Sugar/Gold
or 1 Enchanted Sugar Cane. Utilize the Garden for
those materials if you decide to go the Sugar Cane route.
Claim your cake buff (visit xMeru, nightlibra or Yadi)
hold an angler 4/5 rod and visit someone with
a Sea Creature Chance beacon
(visit PrincessVictra, ReyMaratov or SakuraPaul).
Marinas Minister Perk will help a lot for this.
This unlocks at 2.5k Raw Porkchop collection and
requires 40 Enchanted Porkchop to craft.
You'll probably gain a bunch of progress for this
if you decide to do Exterminator in Barn. Else
you can run Pig Minions, if you have the capacity
for it. Give them the best fuel and storage
that you have access to and collect in time.
You should use SkyHanni's Trapper features
to make this easier. Use /warp trapper
to get back to Trevor whenever you want.
You will need a bow for this.
Farm Mushroom Blocks in the Desert
with an Efficiency 5 Silk Touch 1 Gold Axe.
Obtain the needed Glowstone by buying a
Glowstone Block from the Builder and breaking
it on your island.
Do your daily commissions in the Dwarven Mines
(4 per day). You will need Mining 12 to go there.
Can also be completed in the Crystal Hollows,
though it might be harder to do so.
This unlocks at 5k Diamond Collection and
needs 1 Enchanted Diamond and 8 Vines (costs 40 Jungle Leaves,
needs Jungle Wood Collection 4 to unlock in /trades).
You should probably mine Pure Diamonds
in the Dwarven Mines for this.
Fish in the Backwater Bayou until you can craft
a few Fishing Minions. Place them on your island,
give them the best fuel and storage you have access
to and don't forget to collect in time.
Fish in the Backwater Bayou until you can craft
a few Fishing Minions. Place them on your island,
give them the best fuel and storage you have access
to and don't forget to collect in time.
Kill goblins or open loot chests in the Crystal Hollows,
then just throw them until you get a Golden Goblin.
Higher level eggs have higher chances of spawning,
but are also rarer to get.
Collect those that you run across
while doing other goals. If you need assistance
you can use TimeDeo's guides on YouTube or
/neusouls on/off for waypoints in game.
This drops from Lapis Zombies in the Deep Caverns
(1% dropchance). To help with this, use a Looting 3+
and Luck 5+ weapon to kill them.
Kill farm animals in the Barn with a Cleaver
with Cleave 5 and Sharpness 5
or spiders in Arachne's Burrow (-309 92 -209)
in the Spider's Den with a Dreadlord Sword.
You can also kill Endermen in The End to
have a chance for an Enderman Pet.
